title: Armor
content:
antine Backlash: When a melee attack hits you, the attack is sent Reeling for 3 turns.

Attackers can't land Critical Hits on the wearer.

Disadvantage on Stealth ChecksNo AC Bonus from Dexterity

Blackguard's Plate

Magical Plate: All incoming damage is reduced by 1

Advantage on Wisdom Saving Throws Checks.

Disadvantage on Stealth ChecksNo AC Bonus from Dexterity

Reaper's Embrace

Magical Plate: All incoming damage is reduced by 2

Reaper's Rigidity: When activated, you can't be moved agains
